short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies your stats to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the statistics (namely time from parts 1 and 2) from the most recent day of the Advent of Code competition (https://adventofcode.com/) in a nice format to the clipboard. To then be shared on whatever medium the user desires.
